SEARCH
Module Photos02
Package controller

Class SlideshowController

java.lang.Object
controller.SlideshowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LogoutController
public class SlideshowController extends Object implements LogoutController
SlideshowController manages the display and navigation of a photo slideshow. It allows users to navigate forward and backward through photos, go back to a previous page, and log out. The controller updates the displayed image and status text based on the current photo index in the album.
